section.heading: Payment to minor.
section.text: If a financial institution is required or permitted to make payment pursuant to this subchapter to a minor designated as a beneficiary, payment may be made pursuant to Chapter 3 of Title 21 of the District of Columbia Code.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 225 of the Uniform Nonprobate Transfers on Death Act (1991 Act).
